what_it_looks_like.en:
You're before a climbing wall, full of colored holds - green, blue, red.

Each color a different route, each hold a new challenge.

You stand before the wall, see the path, plan in your mind: right, left, up, weight shift...

You grip the first hold - feeling the roughness under your fingers, muscles tense, heart starts pounding.

You start ascending... step by step, hold by hold...

Your body leans, you try to maintain balance, left foot on small edge, right hand gripping distant hold...

Critical moment - need to shift all your weight on one hand to reach next hold...

Muscles burning, fingers tiring, but mind says: "You can!"

Climb higher... summit close... last hold... made it!

The thrill isn't just reaching the top - it's every decision, every weight shift, every balance moment.

inner_sensation.en: Inner cohesion with feeling of calculated strength - your whole body works as one unit, every muscle knows its role.

why_you.en:
- You love direct physical challenge - not just mind games, but real strength and actual control
- You enjoy solving problems with your body - each route a puzzle, your body the tool
- You love feeling of tangible achievement - when you reach the top, you truly feel you accomplished something
- Your challenge is progressive - harder route each time, smaller holds each week

first_week.en:
**First Week - Getting to Know Holds:**

â€¢ Day 1-2: Route reading - learn to read holds and colors, plan path before starting

â€¢ Day 3-4: Grip exercises - strengthen fingers and wrist, learn to hold safely

â€¢ Day 5-7: First complete climb - easy route (V0-V1), important thing is reaching top feeling confident

Goal: Build confidence in your strength and quick route-reading ability

progress_markers.en:
**How You Know You're Progressing:**

âœ“ Your fingers become stronger - can hold smaller grips for longer

âœ“ Your route reading becomes faster - know optimal path just by looking

âœ“ Fatigue comes later - can climb longer routes before getting tired

âœ“ Balance becomes natural - body knows how to balance automatically

win_condition.en:
True victory:

â€¢ Reaching top without falling (clean climb)
â€¢ Or completing route above your usual grade (grade challenger)
â€¢ Or using minimum attempts (efficiency master)

Each success a step forward

mode.en: Solo (personal challenge) or Group (encouragement and help)

variant_vr.en:
**VR Version:**

Games like:
â€¢ The Climb 1 & 2 - realistic climbing in stunning scenery
â€¢ Cave Digger: Riches - climbing in caves
â€¢ Climbey - creative climbing challenges

Advantage: Climbing experience without fall risk, unlimited routes

variant_no_vr.en:
**Non-VR Version:**

â€¢ Boulder Climbing in climbing gyms
â€¢ Indoor Climbing Gyms with multiple routes
â€¢ Outdoor Rock Climbing (for advanced)

You need:
â€¢ Proper climbing shoes
â€¢ Chalk for better grip
â€¢ Trainer for start (to learn safety)

Advantage: Complete physical training, real muscle building, supportive community

psychological_hook.en:
**Why You'll Get Hooked:**

This is the sport of direct challenge - you against gravity, against the wall, against yourself.

Every route a success story - every hold you grip, every step you climb, every summit you reach.

The community here is different - everyone encourages everyone, no toxic competition, just support and motivation.

After first month, you'll understand why climbers say:
"Climbing isn't just sport - it's meditation, challenge, and community all at once"
